name: hexpass
description: Generate cryptographically secure hexadecimal passwords and secrets

scripts.test: node bin/hexpass.js && node bin/hexpass.js 64 && node bin/hexpass.js --bytes 16 && node bin/hexpass.js 16 --count 2 && node bin/hexpass.js 48 --env TEST_SECRET && node bin/hexpass.js 32 --json
